meanings.definition: To look at closely or carefully
meanings.sent1: She was inspecting the tiny details of the flower.
meanings.sent2: The detective was inspecting the crime scene for clues.
meanings.sent3: While inspecting the cake, she found a hidden message inside.
meanings.sent4: His eyes were like magnifying glasses, inspecting every movement.
meanings.sent5: Inspecting the old photograph, she noticed a familiar face in the background.
